sentences.sContent: Sam and John are pulling the rope.
Sam and I have been together for over a year.
sentences.sCn: 山姆和我在一起已经有一年多了。

sentences.sContent: Over several hours, Sam explained my assignment, should I choose to accept it.
sentences.sCn: 过了几个小时，我的任务山姆解释说，我应该选择接受它。

phrases.pCn: [口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）
